title: bugsplat and repair client in 2 ranked games
body: from today i still triying play ranked and already 2 games i get a bugsplat error and my client downloading the same archives the 2 times. so what happens.... i need to send a ticket for this. because im getting leaver status for this

replies.body: I'd start by doing some general troubleshooting with the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as those steps cover the common reasons a program might unexpectedly crash. It could be any number of things going wrong, so be sure to test those steps one by one. Let me know what seems to help or what doesn't.
